bio: ðŸ’— MOTOKO HOLDER ðŸ’— #ROHKI Season Final holder #Camelventure member #OPsupporter
contributionDescription:
The first thing I want to mention is: Using OP Mainet. I use OP mainet to buy and sell tokens and mint NFT music. To be honest, using the ETH mainet network with expensive gas fees is one of the big problems for people with limited financial resources like me. Optimism Mainet helped me solve this problem
The second thing is: Testing and feedback: Use applications, games... on the OP platform, identify any game issues, bugs or usability issues and provide valuable feedback to help improve the Apps.
The third thing is Community Building: Interacting with the community, individuals on X platform, telegram..., answering questions, promoting a positive and harmonious community environment import.

contributionLinks.description: This is my wallet address. I use to mint NFT music on the Sound platform
This is one of the times I used X to promote the OP

impactDescription: As I mentioned above, using the OP platform to make buying and selling transactions is my contribution to growing the OP network. As an individual, I don't have too much influence on the development of OP mainet but as a member of the Camel community, we have made a significant impact on the community especially is a music loving community through creating a mint NFT music wave on Sound.

fundingSources.description: I haven't received any OP yet

pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, NFT Minting, User Experience & Adoption
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for violating rule 10. The applicant's contribution is mainly using the OP Mainnet for transactions, which falls under user interactions, and this is explicitly mentioned as not within the scope to be rewarded in RetroPGF 3.
